name: Create products in CS-Cart from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Make will watch your specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and create CS-Cart products. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1H2VidulC7G3wgv9tjRGQ39353WZJq6wO_Kd4aPZr0qc/edit?usp=sharing).
